meanings.definition: The quality or state of being capable of being upgraded.
meanings.sent1: The upgradeability of my phone allows me to install new features easily.
meanings.sent2: Software companies often prioritize upgradeability to keep their products current.
meanings.sent3: The robot's upgradeability made it the envy of all the other machines in the factory.
meanings.sent4: Her upgradeability in learning new languages was like a superpower that amazed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The upgradeability of the car's engine made it a top choice for mechanics.

meanings.definition: The ability to be improved or enhanced through upgrades.
meanings.sent1: I appreciate the upgradeability of this software; it allows me to customize it to my needs.
meanings.sent2: The upgradeability of the computer's memory made it faster and more efficient.
meanings.sent3: The cake's upgradeability with extra frosting made it a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: His upgradeability in sports was like watching a caterpillar turn into a butterfly.
meanings.sent5: The upgradeability of the house's insulation saved us money on heating bills.
